duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide training to enhance the team's ability to exceed high standards of customer service, product knowledge, and sales.
Maximize profitable sales by reviewing sales and margin information regularly.
Ensure effective space management techniques are utilized and maintain the store graphics system, focusing on customer service and maximizing profitable sales.
Fully replenish all fixtures at all times and evaluate and communicate on competitors' visual merchandising techniques.
Motivate and develop a high-performance team, sharing the LEGO Brand, Vision, and Values.
Assist the ASM and SM in maintaining holiday, attendance, and team scheduling and supervise Sales Associates during the shift, dealing with potential issues appropriately.
Complete orders for store and office supplies in line with guidelines and operating budgets.
Ensure money handling procedures are followed by all Sales Associates and maintain a well-organized stockroom at all times.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or General Education Degree (GED)
